publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4630 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Parliamentary Direction Under Rule 11.8.3â€”That the Parliament directs that, for the purposes of its consideration of the Planning etc. (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2, the Communities Committee may vote using the electronic voting system, in accordance with Rule 11.8.3 of Standing Orders. Supported by: George Lyon*
